text: Ani he majhya janasamuhacya lokanno! Tumhi apalya palanakartyajavala apalya aparadhanci maphi maga ani tyacya darabarata tauba (ksama-yacana) kara. Yasathi ki tyane pa'usa padanare dhaga tumacyavara pathavaveta. Ani tumacya sakti-samarthyata anakhi vadha karavi ani tumhi gunhegara banuna tonda phiravu naka
